criteria.criteriaKey.label: label
criteria.deceased_paid_into_SS.label: The deceased worked and paid Social Security taxes on their earnings.
criteria.deceased_died_of_COVID.label: The deceased died or likely died of COVID-19.
criteria.deceased_death_location_is_US.l: The deceased died in the U.S., including its territories.
The deceased was a public safety officer who died in the line of duty.
criteria.deceased_date_of_death.label: The deceased died on the following date:

criteria.deceased_served_in_active_milit: Did the person who died serve in the active military, naval, or air service?
criteria.deceased_service_status.label: The service status of the deceased is
criteria.deceased_service_status.values2: discharged under conditions other than dishonorable
criteria.deceased_service_status.values4: a member of the National Guard/Reserve
criteria.deceased_death_circumstance.lab: One of the following circumstances apply to the deceased:
criteria.deceased_death_circumstance.val: died as a result of a service-connected disability/illness
died while receiving/traveling to VA care
died while receiving/eligible for VA compensation
criteria.deceased_grave_headstone.label: The deceased is buried in an unmarked grave, or their grave is marked with a privately purchased headstone.
criteria.applicant_paid_into_SS.label: You worked and paid Social Security taxes on your earnings.
criteria.applicant_ss_number.label: You have a valid Social Security number.

criteria.applicant_marital_status.label: Your marital status is
criteria.applicant_marriage_length.label: If divorced, your marriage lasted at least 10 years.
criteria.applicant_citizen_status.label: You are a U.S. citizen or eligible non-citizen.
criteria.applicant_disability.label: You have a medically determinable physical or mental impairment (including an emotional or learning problem).
criteria.applicant_ability_to_work.label: You are unable to work for a year or more because of a disability or your disability is expected to result in death.
criteria.applicant_income.label: You have limited income and resources.
criteria.applicant_health_insurance.labe: You are uninsured through health insurance and are ineligible for Medicaid.
criteria.applicant_dependents_children.l: You are pregnant or have dependent children who are under 19 years old.
criteria.applicant_declared_disaster.lab: Your residence is in a declared disaster area.
criteria.applicant_high-school_diploma.l: You have a high school diploma or equivalent.
criteria.applicant_degree_cerificate_pro: You are enrolled or accepted as a student in an eligible degree or certificate program.
criteria.applicant_disaster_zone.label: What is your zip code?
Did you recently lose a loved one?
criteria.applicant_lost_a_service_member: Did you recently lose a loved one who served in the military?
criteria.applicant_child_spouse_SS.label: You are a child or a spouse of a person who is receiving retirement or disability benefits.
criteria.applicant_family_of_service_mem: You are a family member of a person who served in the active military, naval, or air service, and he/she is
captured/detained in the line of duty
disabled due to a service-connected disability/illness
criteria.applicant_care_for_child.label: You are caring for the child of the person who died, is retired or has disabilities, and the child is under age 16 or is disabled.
criteria.applicant_relationship.label: Your relationship to the person who died is
criteria.applicant_paid_funeral_expenses: You paid for the funeral/burial expenses.

a member of the National Guard/Reserve
criteria.applicant_minimum_service_requi: You served for at least 90 days of active-duty service.
criteria.applicant_service_disability.la: Your disability was caused, or made worse by your active-duty military service.
